Sentencas: This work reports on the dielectric and electrical properties of a single-phase polycrystalline pyrochlore structured Gd2Zr2O7 ceramics with a highly dense and compact microstructure.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction along with Raman spectroscopic studies confirmed the formation of the pyrochlore phase; while the electron microscopy investigations showed the uniformly distributed and densely packed micrometer-sized grains.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic

Sentencas: The relaxation phenomena and conduction processes in Gd2Zr2O7 analyzed using complex impedance spectroscopy which showed the appearance of low-frequency dielectric dispersion suggesting the dominance of conduction by oxygen ions.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic

Sentencas: Observation of double semi-circular arcs in the Nyquist plots confirms that both grains and grain boundaries contribute to the electrical impedance of Gd2Zr2O7.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic

Sentencas: The temperature-dependent ac conductivity studies on Gd2Zr2O7 followed the Jonscher's power law exhibited a strong dispersive behavior at the low temperature (< 300 degrees C) over the whole frequency region; whereas a weak dispersive nature observed at the higher temperature in the higher frequency region.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic

Sentencas: An enhanced conductivity with relaxation phenomenon at elevated temperature is attributed to the transition from prolonged hopping to short-range ionic transportation.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic

Sentencas: The increase in the ac conductivity with temperature reveals that Gd2Zr2O7 pyrochlore has a negative coefficient of resistance.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic

Sentencas: Because of the good control of the electrical transport properties of Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic on its structure, it could be further exploited for the development of advanced solid-electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural, dielectric and electrical properties of pyrochlore-type Gd2Zr2O7 ceramic
